citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:45AM on
December 9th, 2022. The licensee was contacted by text and stated that no one was available to accompany the
inspector today due to other commitments.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:45AM on 
December 9th, 2022. The licensee was contacted by text and stated that no one was available to accompany the 
inspector today due to other commitments. 
 
 
 
End Section
